db

Class DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.DBConnection

  • public class DBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the database queries for the Webreports application.

      • getChairLPReports

        public java.util.Vector<ReviewReport> getChairLPReports(java.lang.String panelName)
                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        This routine retrieves all LP/VLPs assigned to the same subject categories as the assigned chair panel. Code assumes panels with same subject area have all the same subject areas
        Parameters:
        panelName - panel name
        Returns:
        Vector all LP/VLPs reports assigned to the panel
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL errors

      • getLPReports

                                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Routine used to retrieve the LP/VLPs by given proposal numbers
        Parameters:
        props - comma separated list of proposal numbers ie: "12201212","12201213"
        Returns:
        Vector all LP/VLPs
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL errors

      • getLPReports

        Throws:

      • getReportByPropNumPanel

        public java.util.Vector<ReviewReport> getReportByPropNumPanel(java.lang.String panelName,
                                                              java.lang.String propNum,
                                                              boolean beforePR)
                                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        This routine initializes a primary or peer review for a single proposal on a panel. While it returns a vector for coding consistency, there should be only 1 entry
        Parameters:
        panelName - current panel name
        propNum - proposal number
        beforePR - true if this is before the peer review
        Returns:
        Vector all review reports for the panel
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL errors

      • getReportsOnPanelByName

        public java.util.Vector<ReviewReport> getReportsOnPanelByName(java.lang.String panelName,
                                                              boolean beforePR)
                                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        This routine gets both the primary and secondary reports on the panel if it is before the peer review. It get the peer review reports if it is during/after the peer review.
        Parameters:
        panelName - current panel name
        beforePR - true if this is before the peer review
        Returns:
        Vector all review reports for the panel
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL errors

      • retrieveReports

        private java.util.Vector<ReviewReport> retrieveReports(java.sql.PreparedStatement stmt,
                                                       java.lang.String rptType)
                                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Routine used to retrieve review report information from the database
        Parameters:
        stmt - prepared sql statement to execute
        rptType - type of report (primary,secondary,peer,final)
        Returns:
        Vector all reports that match the @param criteria
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL errors

      • getSecondaryReports

        public java.util.Vector<ReviewReport> getSecondaryReports(java.lang.String panelName,
                                                          java.util.Vector<ReviewReport> reportsList)
                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        This routine returns the secondary review reports for the panel
        Parameters:
        panelName - panel name
        reportsList - current reports already retrieved
        Returns:
        Vector reports list with secondary reports appended
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL errors

      • getReportsByUserID

        public java.util.Vector<ReviewReport> getReportsByUserID(int userID,
                                                         boolean beforePR)
        Returns a Vector of ReviewReport objects assigned to a reviewer
        Parameters:
        userID - reviewer id
        beforePR - true if before the Peer Review
        Returns:
        Vector ReviewReport reports for given reviewer

      • getProposal

        public Proposal getProposal(java.lang.String proposalNumber)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get proposal information for a given proposal number Also determines if there are constrained targets If type == "TOO" or number of targets that are time constrained (ie. the time_critical field in the target table is Y) is greater than 0, the * proposal is constrained. A Value of "p" in the time_critical field means preferred.
        Parameters:
        proposalNumber - proposal number
        Returns:
        Proposal proposal information for given proposal
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL errors

      • getReportType

        public java.lang.String getReportType(int userID,
                                      java.lang.String proposalNumber,
                                      boolean beforePR)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get the report type for a proposal for the given reviewer. Types can be primary/peer or secondary/secondary peer.
        Parameters:
        userID - reviewer id
        proposalNumber - proposal number
        beforePR - true, if before the peer review
        Returns:
        String report type assigned to the reviewer for the proposal number
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL errors

      • reportExecuteQuery

        private java.util.Vector<ReviewReport> reportExecuteQuery(java.lang.String sqlStmt,
                                                          int userID,
                                                          boolean beforePR)
                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Execute the SQL query and build the vector of Review Reports. The userID is used to determine the type of report if it's before the peer review (primary or secondary).
        Parameters:
        sqlStmt - SQL statement
        userID - reviewer ID
        beforePR - true, if before the peer review
        Returns:
        Vector review reports that satisfy the SQL query
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL errors

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Vector vector of all proposals assigned to the panel for the current AO

                            throws java.sql.SQLException

        Parameters:

        propnum - the proposal number
        type - type of reviewer conflict
        flag - Y for inactive conflict, else N
